name: Skechers U.S.A., Inc.
description: Skechers U.S.A., Inc. is a global leader in the lifestyle and performance footwear industry, offering a diverse range of products for men, women, and children. Founded in 1992 by Robert Greenberg and his son Michael, Skechers has grown to become one of the world's largest athletic and lifestyle shoe brands, known for its innovative designs, quality workmanship, and extensive selection. The company’s product lines include performance footwear for running, walking, and sports, as well as casual shoes, sandals, and work footwear. Skechers has built a strong reputation for comfort and style, appealing to a wide demographic of consumers. The brand is also recognized for its marketing campaigns, featuring high-profile endorsements from athletes and celebrities, which have significantly contributed to its global appeal. Additionally, Skechers is committed to sustainability and ethical manufacturing practices, striving to reduce its environmental impact through various initiatives. With a strong retail presence both in physical stores and online, Skechers continues to expand its reach in international markets, solidifying its position as a key player in the footwear industry.

faq.question: Where is Skechers headquartered?
